resources.string: Hello! First screen here.\nIf you would like to get a quote the press the button.
Hello! Second screen here.\nHere is a quote. It\'s not very good but i hope you like it anyway.

string-array.name: not_so_epic_quotes
string-array.item: Better one hand in the forest than ten hands in a bird.
Now the boiled stake is fleshed.
To be or not to be so much... that is a question!?
